name: tegbzn
description: This app does one little thing, and does it well.

TEGBZN_CONF_URL.description: Raw github gist URL for TEGBZN config file.

RCONF_URL.description: Raw github gist URL for rclone config file.

APP_URL.description: Your heroku app url, for eg if your app name is 'tegbzn' then the url will be 'https://tegbzn.herokuapp.com'.

CTRL_USERNAME.description: TEGBZN username. You use this to log in to the TEGBZN web instance. Leave this as it is for default values.

CTRL_PASS.description: TEGBZN password. You use this to log in to the TEGBZN web instance. Leave this as it is for default values.

UPLOAD_DIR.description: Directory to upload to in your drive. No need to write rclone remote name and do not put a slash '/' at the start or the end. For eg: 'nzbget/downloads'
